I am Telegram Message auto bot.I can forward (copy) new messages from one Telegram chat (DM/bot/group/channel) to other chats as soon as they arrive.Checkout all my /featuresYou will have to login to the bot.Multiple source and target chats, can be both public or private - Use /incoming and /outgoingAdd delay to messages - Use /delayReplace and remove text (words, usernames, URLs) - /filterBlacklist and whitelist keywords - /blacklist and /whitelistTurn off URL preview - Button in /transformForward messages with header - Turn on /should_forwardTurn off sending all media or all text - Button in /transformAdd text to beginning or end of each message - /begin_text and /end_textReplicate edited and deleted messages from source - /should_edit and /should_deleteWhitelist users in group - /filter_users
